name: Church Point
pestRiskFactors: Coastal humidity increases termite and cockroach activity

localInfo: Church Point is part of Sydney's Northern Beaches, offering a coastal lifestyle with proximity to bushland reserves. The area experiences common Sydney pest issues including termites, cockroaches, and rodents. Regular pest inspections are recommended for all property types in this area.
